// src/services/api.js
const BASE_URL='https://pokeapi.co/api/v2';export const getPokemonByType=async function(type){let offset=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;let limit=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:10;const response=await fetch(`${BASE_URL}/type/${type}`);const data=await response.json();const pokemonEntries=data.pokemon.slice(offset,offset+limit);const pokemonData=await Promise.all(pokemonEntries.map(async _ref=>{let{pokemon}=_ref;const pokemonResponse=await fetch(pokemon.url);return pokemonResponse.json();}));return{results:pokemonData,count:data.pokemon.length};};export const getPokemonDetails=async pokemonName=>{const response=await fetch(`${BASE_URL}/pokemon/${pokemonName}`);const data=await response.json();return data;};
